meanings.def: to make something look more attractive by putting things on it
examples: decorate something with something They decorated the room with flowers and balloons.
decorate something The cake was decorated to look like a car.
The family gets together on Christmas Eve to decorate the tree.

meanings.def: to put paint, wallpaper, etc. on the walls and ceilings of a room or house
examples: decorate something to decorate a room/a wall/a house/an apartment
We need to decorate the sitting room.
These villas come fully furnished and decorated.
decorate something in something The room is decorated in pale blues and greens.
The dining room is decorated in a modern style.

meanings.def: to be placed on something in order to make it look more attractive
examples: Photographs of actors decorated the walls of the restaurant.

meanings.def: to give somebody an award or medal as a sign of respect for something they have done
examples: be decorated (for something) She was decorated for her efforts during the war.
the most highly decorated unit in the British Army
